GK16visa08cu:7: natvaṅgipadādaṅgarasasya vyavṛttistatrapi mādhuryyādyanubhavāt rasapadaṃ cāsaṃlakṣyakramaparaṃ bhāvādāvapi guṇāṅgīkārāt /
GK16visa08cu:13: guṇaśabdavācyāḥ, tathā kāvye 'ṅgitvamāptasya rasasya dharmāḥ svarūpaviśeṣā
GK16visa08cu:15: yathā caiṣāṃ rasamātrasya dharmatvaṃ tathā darśitameva /
GK16visa08cu:17: (vi, kha) aṅgitvamāptasyetyanena śarīriṇa ātmana upasthitatvāt taṃ dṛṣṭāntayati--yathā khalviti /
GK16visa08cu:20: svasamarpaketi---svasya guṇasya samarpako bodhako yaḥ padasamūhastasya kāvyavyapadeśasyaupayikaṃ yadānuguṇyaṃ svāśrayiṇā rasena
GK16visa08cu:22: nīrasasya kāvyaśabdavācyatvābhāvāt kintu tatra lākṣaṇikameva kāvyapadamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:23: yadyapi varṇaireva guṇā vyaḍajyante na padairiti padasamūhasya guṇasamarpakatā nāsti tathāpi padasamūhaghaṭakavarṇaistatsamarpaṇāt ;
GK16visa08cu:30: (lo, ā) yathā khalvityato 'nantaraṃ loke iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:31: svasyātmano mādhuryyādereva samarpakaḥ arthāt sahṛdayahṛdayeṣu niveśayitā yaḥ padasamudāyaḥ yadanuguṇatvamiti; yadyapi mādhuryyādīnāṃ rasasyātmasvarūpaviśeṣātmakatvāt utkarṣahetutvaṃ nāsti, tathāpi padasandarbhasya tanmukhaprekṣitayaiva tathāvidhavyañjakatvaucityānusāreṇa
GK16visa08cu:34: tena padasandarbheṇanukūlyattasya rasotkarṣakatvaṃ mādhuryyādiguṇeṣu upacaryyata iti darśitaṃ prathamaparicchede /
GK16visa08cu:35: mādhuryamojo 'tha prasāda iti te tridhā // VisSd_8.1 //
GK16visa08cu:37: (lo, i) tridhā prācīnoktasya pratyekaṃ daśaprakārasya nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visa08cu:44: sa ca āhlādaviśeṣe ratyādijñānānandajātaḥ svādanākhyavyāpāragrahyo rasasvarūpaḥ tadvṛttiḥ na tu tādṛśāhlāda eva mādhuryyaṃ, tadā tasya rasadharmatvānupapatteḥ tathā ca cittadravībhāvasvarūpāhlādavṛttiḥ tādṛśāhlādatāvacchedako dharmo mādhuryyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:47: iha cāsvādasya ānandaparaparyyāyatvena svādasādhāraṇatvāt cittadravībhāvamaya ityanenāvyāptiparihāraḥ
GK16visa08cu:53: sa ca rasasvarūpāhlādajanakatāvacchedako ratyādiniṣṭho dharma ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:54: ratyādereva rasatāprāptyā tasya rasavṛttitvamapi; sa eva dharmo
GK16visa08cu:59: tanmate tu dravībhāvaścittavṛttirāhlāda ātmavṛttirityanayorabheda eva nāsti /
GK16visa08cu:60: kintu āhlādasthena mādhuryyeṇa cittasya dravībhāvo janyata eva rāgamādhuryyeṇaiveti
GK16visa08cu:66: anāviṣṭatā tu tasya svābhāvikī tadātmakaṃ yatkāṭhinyaṃ tajjanyau yau śatrumāraṇotsāharūpamanyukrodhau tadādikṛtvā ye uṣṇaprāyatvarūpadīptatvavismayahāsāstadādyupahito yaścittasya vikṣepaścāñcalyaṃ tatparityāgena arthāt cittasyāviṣṭatvena yo ratyādyākārānuviddho ratyādiviṣayapāraṇimeva jñānarūpānandastaduddhodhena
GK16visa08cu:70: ratyādyākāretyatra ādipadāt mādhuryyāśrayayoḥ karuṇaśāntayoḥ sthāyibhāvasyāpi parigrahaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:72: sa eva svādanākhyavyāpāragamyaḥ prāgukto rasa ityuktaṃ,
GK16visa08cu:76: cittasya eva tatsvarūpaṃ kāṭhinyaṃ, tathā vīrādāviva manyukodhādijanyaṃ
GK16visa08cu:77: yaddīptatvam, evaṃ adbhutādāviva vismayahāsayukto yo vikṣepasteṣāṃ parityāgena parihāreṇa
GK16visa08cu:80: saṃbhoge karuṇo vipralambhe śānte 'dhikaṃ kramāt // VisSd_8.2 //
GK16visa08cu:91: raṇau ladhū ca tadvyaktau varṇāḥ kāraṇatāṃ gatāḥ // VisSd_8.3 //
GK16visa08cu:100: racanā sandhiḥ tasya ca tadutpannavarṇamādhuryyavaśādeva mādhuryyavarṇatvena prāptāvapi sandhau api tādṛśā varṇaḥ na ūhādyā iti kavyupadeśārthaṃ pṛthaguktam /
GK16visa08cu:102: (lo, ṛ) mūdrdhni iti vargā kādayo māvasānāḥ pañca pañca bhūtvā pañcavārgāḥ teṣāmantyāḥ ṅañaṇanamāḥ tairmūdrdhni sthitairyuktā arthāt
GK16visa08cu:104: ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍhāḥ na tu antimavarṇena yuktāḥ na ca svarūpāvāsthitā api /
GK16visa08cu:105: raṇau laghuhrasvāntaritau, tasya mādhuryyasya vyaktau, evamasamāsā mandasamāsāśca /
GK16visa08cu:114: “latākuñjaṃ guñjan madavadalipuñjaṃ capalayan samāliṅgannaṅgaṃ drutataramanaṅgaṃ prabalayan
GK16visa08cu:115: marunmandaṃ mandaṃ dalitamaravindaṃ taralayan rajovṛndaṃ vindan kirati makarandaṃ diśi diśi”
GK16visa08cu:117: (vi, jha) ato bahūn tādṛśān varṇān darśayitumāha---yathā veti /
GK16visa08cu:118: marut diśi diśi makarandaṃ kirati, kīdṛśaḥ, guñjatāṃ madavatāmalīnāṃ puñjo yatra tādṛśaṃ latākuñjaṃ mandaṃ mandaṃ capalayan /
GK16visa08cu:120: anaṅgaṃ ca drutataraṃ pravalayan prakṛṣṭaṃ balavantaṃ kurvan /
GK16visa08cu:122: rajovṛndam arthāt vikasitāravindānāṃ parāgasamūhaṃ vindan labhamānaḥ
GK16visa08cu:123: (vidḷ lābhe ) atra sandhāvapi bahavo varṇā uktarūpāḥ /
GK16visa08cu:131: āyurghṛtamitivat, tathā ca rasavṛttinā ojasā cittasya vistārarūpaṃ
GK16visa08cu:133: atra eva cittasya vistārarūpadīptatvajanakamoja iti kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpyuktam /
GK16visa08cu:142: hāsye vikāśadharmakatvāt ojaśca prāyaḥ śṛṅgāraniṣṭhatayā ca mādhuryasyotkṛṣṭatvam /
GK16visa08cu:143: bhayānake cittavṛttervikāśābhāvāt yadyapi mādhuryaṃ, tathāpi vibhāvaucityādojaḥ samāveśaḥ
GK16visa08cu:149: śakāraśca ṣakāraśra tasya vyañjakatāṃ gatāḥ // VisSd_8.6 //
GK16visa08cu:152: (lo, ḷ) ayamarthaḥ--kacaṭatapaiḥ khachaṭhathaphāḥ, gajaḍadabaiḥ ghajhaḍhadhabhāḥ yuktāḥ /
GK16visa08cu:162: tena kakhkha iva keccachāpi gaghgha iva ghecchāpi tathā bodhyā kaṭutvasāmyāt /
GK16visa08cu:163: atra cānukte 'pi tulyayoryogo 'pi kāvyaprakāśakṛdukto grāhyaḥ kaṭutvāviśeṣāt /
GK16visa08cu:164: tena kka gga jja ityādayo 'pi bodhyāḥ /
GK16visa08cu:167: takracakrādau adhaḥ ārdrakam ityādau dvayoḥ rephau bodhyau /
GK16visa08cu:170: samāsabahulā ghaṭanā ityatra ghaṭanāpadaṃ vinyāsamātraparaṃ sandhiparaṃ ca /
GK16visa08cu:171: tena samāsabahulā dīrghasamāsavān vinyāsaḥ, auddhatyena kaṭutvena yuktaḥ sandhiścetyarthaḥ
GK16visa08cu:174: cittaṃ vyāpnoti yaḥ kṣipraṃ śuṣkendhanamivānalaḥ // VisSd_8.7 //
GK16visa08cu:175: sa prasādaḥ samasteṣu raseṣu racanāsu ca /
GK16visa08cu:179: tathā ca yo guṇaḥ kṣipraṃ ślokārthajñānaṃ vyāpnoti āviṣkaroti janayatīti yāvat /
GK16visa08cu:186: saptamyadhikaraṇatāyāṃ, racanā śabdaprathanā tatra saptamī ca vyañjakatāyām /
GK16visa08cu:188: na caivaṃ prasādarahitaḥ ko 'pi aloko na syāditi vācyam /
GK16visa08cu:189: sarvajātīyāsu racanāsu, na tu sarvaracanāvyaktiṣu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:199: racanāniṣṭhatvaṃ prayatnavidheyatvena rasasādacaryeṇa uktiṃ prasādātikrameṣu sāmānyamapi saṅghaṭanā karuṇavipralambhaśṛṅgārau vyanākti
GK16visa08cu:202: “sūcīmukhena sakṛdeva kṛtavraṇastvaṃ muktākalāpa ! luṭhasi stanayoḥ priyāyāḥ /
GK16visa08cu:203: bāṇaiḥ smarasya śataśo vinikṛttamarmā svapne 'pi tāṃ kathamahaṃ na
GK16visa08cu:206: (vi, ḍha) sūcimukheneti---priyāyāḥ stananyastaṃ muktāhāraṃ parokṣamapi bhāvopanītaṃ sambodhya virahiṇa uktiriyam /
GK16visa08cu:211: (lo, o) yat punareṣāṃ śabdavṛttitvamucyate tatra hetumāha---eṣāmiti /
GK16visa08cu:213: śleṣaḥ samādhiraudāryaḥ pasāda iti ye punaḥ // VisSd_8.9 //
GK16visa08cu:215: ojasi bhaktyā aujaḥ padavācye śabda (artha) dharmaviśeṣe /
GK16visa08cu:221: itthaṃ rasavṛttaya eva traya eva guṇāḥ paramparayā śabdārthavṛttayaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:223: arthavyaktimudāratvamojaḥ kāntiḥ samādhayaḥ “iti daśaguṇānāṃ madhye śleṣādiguṇacatuṣṭayamojasyantarbhavatītyāha---śleṣa ityādi /
GK16visa08cu:225: asmaduktaujoguṇavyañjakavarṇeṣveva hi te catvārā guṇā varttante iti tairucyate /
GK16visa08cu:226: tathā ca paramparayā śabdavṛtterasmaduktaujoguṇasamādhānādhikaraṇā eva te tanmate paryyavasyanti
GK16visa08cu:229: ājaḥ padavācye rasaguṇaviśeṣe bhaktyā paramparārūpayā bhaktyā śabdadharme 'ntarbhavantītyarthaḥ
GK16visa08cu:233: (lo, au) kathaṃ traya eva guṇā ityatrāha---śleṣa iti /
GK16visa08cu:238: uccairuccarati dhvaniḥ śrutipathonmāthī yathāyaṃ tathā prāyapreṃkhadasaṃkhyaśaṅkhadhavalā veleyamudracchati” //
GK16visa08cu:241: (vi, ta) tatra tairuktasya śleṣasya lakṣaṇamāha---śleṣo bahūnāmiti /
GK16visa08cu:244: sahasā sphālanakriyayā uddhataḥ ityataḥ ayaṃ dhvaniḥ yathā uccairuccarati,
GK16visa08cu:245: prāyaḥ sambhāvane, tathā velā samudrasya nīram udracchati;
GK16visa08cu:252: tacca tādṛśaśabdavṛttitvāt paramparayā śabdavṛttyojoguṇa eva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:257: tasya rabhasena āsphālaḥ arddanam arthāt jalasyaiva /
GK16visa08cu:261: āroha utkarṣaḥ, avaroho 'pakarṣaḥ, tayoḥ kramo vairasyatānāvaho vinyāsaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:277: 'pakarṣaḥ sa cātra draupadāyaśvāsanarūpeṇa krodhābhāvena dīrghasamāsābhāvaḥ yogyasthāne vinyāsād vairasyānādhāyakaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:287: sucaraṇaviniviṣṭairnūpurairnartakīnāṃ jhaṇiti raṇitamāsīttatra citraṃ kalaṃ ca /
GK16visa08cu:291: nṛtyatprāyatā ca anubhavaikagamyā vaktumaśakyā udāharaṇe bodhyā /
GK16visa08cu:295: tathāpi tanmate tādṛśarasānusandhānāt prāgeva śabdānāṃ nṛtyatprāyatvarūpaprauḍhauktimātrajñānāt aujoguṇānubhāva ityāha---atra
GK16visa08cu:297: tathā cātra sṛṅgāranuguṇe 'pyetādṛśaprauḍhyā vyajyamāne aujasya smadukte audāryyasyāntabhārva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:300: “yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumadāt pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnām” iti /
GK16visa08cu:330: (lo, ī) kāntiryathā mama--- netre khañjanagañjane sarasijapratyarthipāṇidvayaṃ vakṣojau
GK16visa08cu:335: masṛṇena vikaṭena vā mārgeṇopakrāntasya sandarbhasya tenaiva pariniṣṭhānaṃ mārgābhedaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:338: “avyūḍhāṅgamarūḍhapāṇijaṭharābhogaṃ ca bibhradvapuḥ pārīndraḥ śiśureṣa pāṇipuṭake sammātu kiṃ tāvatā /
GK16visa08cu:347: atra tādṛśasthale tu samatā mādhuryyaujoguṇayoranyataraguṇa ityarthaḥ
GK16visa08cu:350: śisureṣaḥ pārīndraḥ siṃhaḥ avyūḍhāṅgam aprauḍhāvayavaṃ pāṇijaṭharāṇāmābhogena paripūrṇatayā rahitaṃ ta vapuḥ dadhat, kṣudratayā pāṇipuṭake sammātu /
GK16visa08cu:351: etāvatā kim ito dṛśyamānāt prodyatāṃ durddharagandhānāṃ sindhuraśatasya hastiśatasya proddāmadānārṇavānāṃ śoṣaṇāt punaḥ kalpāgniralpāyate /
GK16visa08cu:360: oja ādi udāhāntāḥ pañcārthaguṇāḥ tadabhāvasya doṣatvādeva svīkṛtā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:361: tathā ca doṣābhāva eva ete pañcaguṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:373: taccādhikapadatvadoṣābhāvatvena uktivaicitryam anekavārapratipādanīyasyārthasya bhaṅgyantareṇa kathanam, tacca anavīkṛtvādoṣābhāvatvena /
GK16visa08cu:390: sphūrjatphutkāraghoraḥ pratidiśamakhilān vārayanneṣa jantūn kopāviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prativanamarūṇocchūnacakṣustarakṣuḥ
GK16visa08cu:395: (vi, ya) vicitratāmātramiti---tathā ca vaicitryamalaṅkāra ityalaṅkārasāmānyalakṣaṇākrāntatvādalaṅkāra evaisau na guṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:401: yogaḥ sammelanaṃ sa eva rūpaṃ yasyā ghaṭanāyāstadrūpaḥ śleṣo vaicitryamātram /
GK16visa08cu:406: kramakauṭilyetyādi bahuvrīhisamāsaṃ vivṛṇotisa eva rūpaṃ yasyā iti /
GK16visa08cu:407: sa eva eṣāṃ yoga eva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:417: dvayaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūrtto nāyakaḥ paścāt pṛṣṭhataḥ upetya vihitakrīḍānubandhacchalaḥ san ekasyā nayane nayanadvayaṃ pidhāya īṣadvakritakandharaḥ sapulakaḥ san ādarādaparāṃ cumbati /
GK16visa08cu:418: aparāṃ kīdṛśī, premṇā ullasanmanasām antarhāsena lasatkapole pulako yasyāstādṛśī ca /
GK16visa08cu:419: ubhayasamarthaneti---pihitanayanāyāḥ krodhaḥ, cumbitāyāḥ prītiścetyumayaṃ pṛṣṭato gamanena nayanapidhānena ca
GK16visa08cu:423: anena ca vācyopapattigrahaṇavyagratayā rasatvādau vyavahitaprāya ityasyāguṇatā /
GK16visa08cu:431: vācyaṃ yaccumbanaṃ paścādgamanādinā tadupapattergrahaṇaniṣpādane dhūrttasya vyagratayā tadvodhāt boddhṝṇāṃ rasāsvādo vyavahitaprāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:452: nijanayanapratibimbe nīlotpalabhrameṇa taddharaṇe pravarttya tadaprāptyā pratāritā vāstavanīlotpale 'pi karamarpāyituṃ tadbhavati na veti vimṛśatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa08cu:462: kvacit “nidāghaśītalahimakāloṣṇsukumāraśarīrāvayavā yoṣit” iti vākyārthe vaktavye “varavaṇinī” iti padābhidhānam /
GK16visa08cu:465: tatra ca padārthe vākyaracanā vākyārthe ca padābhidhā /
GK16visa08cu:466: prādirvyāsasamāsau ca iti caturvidhā prauḍhiḥ parairuktā /
GK16visa08cu:467: tasya guṇatvaṃ nocitam iti vaktuṃ tadīyaṃ padārthe vākyaracanetyādikaṃ darśayati---kvaciñcandra itīti /
GK16visa08cu:475: (lo, ṝ) vākyārthanyāso yathā--- asau nānākāro bhavati sukhaduḥ khavyatikaraḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā prabhavati bhavatyeva bhavataḥ /
GK16visa08cu:476: janastasmādūrddhaṃ bhavati na ca duḥkhaṃ na ca sukham /
GK16visa08cu:477: iti asyaiva samāso yathā--- śrūyatāṃ dharmasarvasvaṃ śrutvā
GK16visa08cu:479: ātmanuḥ pratikūlāni pareṣāṃ na samācareti // iti
GK16visa08cu:489: yathā nāyaṃ paṇḍita ityekavākyena vaktavye nāyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ nāyaṃ tarkaṃ vettītyādikhaṇḍakhaṇḍavākyena samastaśāstrājñānakathanam /
